name: Come Out and Play
wikiSummary: According to the Come Out and Play Songfacts this song about gang violence in schools was written after a trip to the Middle East. This is what inspired Dexter to write the catchy guitar riff.
wikiText: According to the Come Out and Play Songfacts this song about gang violence in schools was written after a trip to the Middle East. This is what inspired Dexter to write the catchy guitar riff. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
